ygData.subject: Re:  Need a Tinker On Mithaniel Marr
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings Battlestaff: I can help you with your tinkering needs.  Let me know when you usually on and I ll do my best to get on-line to meet you.  What sort of
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings Battlestaff:

I can help you with your tinkering needs. Let me know when you usually on
and I'll do my best to get on-line to meet you. What sort of help are you
looking for? My tinkering skill is currently 71.

QdP

"Quasinom de Plume is my quasi nom-de-plume"

--- Battlestaff Fuzzietoe <andrie@...> wrote:
> I need a Tinker on Mithaniel Marr to do some work for me. This only
> Requires
> 70 or so skill. So if you can help please give me a tell. I am
> Battlestaff.
>
> Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr
> 40th Ranked Druid of Karana
> Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher
>
>
<HR>
<html>
>
